Content:: This article documents the chronology and epidemiology of SARS-CoV-2, the virus that causes the coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19) and is responsible for the COVID-19 pandemic, in August 2021. The first human cases of COVID-19 were identified in Wuhan, China, in December 2019. World Health Organization weekly report:[14] World Health Organization weekly report:[64] World Health Organization weekly report:[119] World Health Organization weekly report:[175] World Health Organization weekly report:[227] No new countries or territories confirmed their first cases during August 2021. By the end of August, only the following countries and territories have not reported any cases of SARS-CoV-2 infections: Asia Europe Oceania
Title: Timeline of the COVID-19 pandemic in August 2021 - Wikipedia
